Content._Comment_: Optionally you're able to change Notifications Content modifying 'Subject' & 'Body'
Content.Subject: {Name} - WebPage Modified
Content.Body: The WebPage {Name} you're tracking has been changed!

Notifier._Comment-1_: Optionally you're able to change Notifier modifying 'User' & 'Password'
Notifier._Comment-2_: If you do so, 'Less Secure App Access' needs to be enabled in Notifier Gmail Account

Server._Comment_: Optionally you're able to change SMTP Server modifying 'Host' & 'Port'
